name: Lapine
description:
Be a bunny, enjoy a simple life!

Eat carrots, run away from the farmer and have fun! And poop from time to time.

Lapine is a game made in ~20h during the Global Game Jam 2023, which theme was 'Roots'.  Please go here and vote (click on the big blue heart) if you like this game!

How to play

- Run around using arrow keys (or the d-pad if you play on mobile!)
- Unroot carrots by quickly tapping Z, but take care, don't break them!
- Be fast! You don't want the farmer to catch you.
- Hide in bushes or run behind him avoid being catched.
